mapper.select: select distinct p.id, p.permission_label, p.pid, p.parent_label, p.permission_code, p.route_name, p.route_url, p.permission_type, p.order_num, p.icon, p.route_path from sys_user u left join sys_user_role ur on ur.user_id = u.id left join sys_role r on r.id = ur.role_id left join sys_role_permission rp on rp.role_id = r.id left join sys_permission p on p.id = rp.permission_id where u.id = #{id} order by p.order_num
